keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver more affordable housing. Residents need greater help to buy their own home and those renting need more protection. Importantly, local authority housing needs better maintenance - I have pushed for this in Union Grove and the Kennington Estate.

Work with police, community organisations, charities and schools to promote the wellbeing of our younger people, steering them away from crime. Taking a zero tolerance approach to gang activity and anti-social behaviour with 1400 more police on the beat in London.

Make Vauxhall and London a cleaner, healthier place to live and work. Since 2010 under the Conservatives, greenhouse gases have been reduced by a quarter. We want to do more, including increasing the number of electric vehicles and meeting our net zero target.
